title: Cinque Terre Content Calendar Configuration
description: Editorial calendar for automated and scheduled content generation

topics.title: Spring Wildflower Hiking Guide
topics.brief: Comprehensive guide to spring wildflower hikes in Cinque Terre (March-May). Cover major trails with botanical highlights, bloom timing by elevation, and photography tips for capturing wildflowers against coastal backdrops.

topics.title: Easter Traditions in Each Village
topics.brief: Explore the unique Easter traditions and celebrations in each of the five villages. Cover religious processions, traditional foods (focaccia di Pasqua, colomba), church services, and how locals celebrate. Include practical tips for visitors during Holy Week.

topics.title: Best Spring Photography Spots
topics.brief: Guide to capturing Cinque Terre in spring light. Cover the golden hour spots, flower-framed village views, vineyard paths with spring growth, and the dramatic weather conditions unique to shoulder season.

spring.weather_context: Temperatures 12-20C, occasional rain, increasingly sunny days

topics.title: Beat the Crowds: Early Morning Strategies
topics.brief: Tactical guide for experiencing Cinque Terre without the summer crowds. Cover early morning hiking (5-7 AM starts), sunrise spots, breakfast at local bars before tourists wake, and the magic of villages before 9 AM. Include specific timing recommendations for each village.

topics.title: Best Swimming Spots by Village
topics.brief: Complete guide to swimming in Cinque Terre. Cover beaches (Monterosso, Guvano), rock swimming spots (Manarola, Riomaggiore marina), the harbor swimming spots, and secret locals-only spots. Include safety tips, water shoes recommendations, and best times to avoid jellyfish.

topics.title: Summer Evening Aperitivo Guide
topics.brief: Guide to the perfect aperitivo hour in each village. Cover sunset-view bars, local wines (Sciacchetra, Cinque Terre DOC), typical aperitivo snacks, pricing expectations, and the art of the Italian evening ritual. Focus on atmosphere over tourist bars.

topics.title: Staying Cool: Hot Weather Survival Guide
topics.brief: Practical guide for dealing with summer heat in Cinque Terre. Cover shaded walking routes, air-conditioned refuges (churches, gelaterias), best times for activities, hydration tips, and the local approach to avoiding the midday sun.

summer.weather_context: Temperatures 25-32C, dry, intense sun, sea swimming ideal

topics.title: Wine Harvest Experiences
topics.brief: Deep dive into the vendemmia (grape harvest) season in Cinque Terre's UNESCO-protected vineyards. Cover the heroic viticulture tradition, opportunities to participate in harvest, winery visits, and the festivals celebrating Sciacchetra production.

topics.title: Autumn Hiking Without the Heat
topics.brief: Why autumn is the best hiking season in Cinque Terre. Cover the perfect temperatures, clearer visibility, golden light for photography, fewer crowds, and the changing colors of the vineyards. Include specific trail recommendations.

topics.title: Mushroom Foraging Traditions
topics.brief: Explore the local mushroom hunting culture in the forests above the villages. Cover porcini season, traditional recipes, where to taste mushroom dishes in restaurants, and the cultural significance of foraging in Liguria.

topics.title: Autumn Storm Watching: A Different Kind of Beauty
topics.brief: Guide to experiencing Cinque Terre's dramatic autumn storms safely. Cover the best sheltered viewpoints, cozy restaurants for rainy days, the power of the Mediterranean sea, and photography tips for moody weather.

fall.weather_context: Temperatures 15-25C, occasional rain, golden light, sea still warm enough for swimming until October

topics.title: Christmas Markets and Traditions
topics.brief: Guide to Christmas in Cinque Terre. Cover the famous Manarola presepe (world's largest illuminated nativity), Riomaggiore's underwater nativity, local Christmas foods, and the intimate atmosphere of villages decorated for the holidays.

topics.title: Winter Storm Watching
topics.brief: The drama of winter storms (mareggiata) on the Cinque Terre coast. Cover safe viewpoints, the power of Mediterranean winter waves, cozy places to watch from warmth, and the rhythm of winter life in the villages.

topics.title: Off-Season Restaurant Recommendations
topics.brief: The best restaurants open during winter months (many close seasonally). Focus on where locals eat, warming Ligurian dishes perfect for cold evenings, and the advantage of reservations being possible at normally-packed spots.

topics.title: Mild Winter Hiking Days
topics.brief: Taking advantage of Cinque Terre's mild Mediterranean winter for hiking. Cover which trails remain open, the beauty of empty paths, what to wear, and the magic of sunny January days on the coast.

winter.weather_context: Temperatures 5-15C, rain common, can be sunny and mild, many businesses closed

evergreen_content.description: Content that remains relevant year-round, updated annually

topics.title: Complete Train Schedule Guide
topics.brief: Comprehensive guide to train travel in Cinque Terre. Cover the regional train system, frequency between villages, Cinque Terre Card options, La Spezia connections, platform navigation, and money-saving tips.

topics.title: Packing List for Cinque Terre
topics.brief: Season-by-season packing guide. Cover hiking gear essentials (shoes especially), swimwear, layers for unpredictable weather, what NOT to bring (heavy luggage for stairs), and village-specific considerations.

topics.title: Accessibility Guide for Each Village
topics.brief: Honest accessibility information for each village. Cover steps/stairs counts, cobblestone conditions, which areas are wheelchair accessible (limited), recommendations for mobility-challenged visitors, and alternatives to hiking.

topics.title: Visiting Cinque Terre on a Budget
topics.brief: Complete budget guide covering affordable accommodation, cheap eats, free activities, Cinque Terre Card value analysis, and day trip vs overnight cost comparison. Include specific price examples.

topics.title: First-Time Visitor's Complete Guide
topics.brief: Everything a first-time visitor needs to know. Cover what Cinque Terre is (and isn't), realistic expectations, how to get there, how long to stay, which villages to prioritize, common mistakes to avoid.

general: Always verify seasonal dates and events are current for the publication year
Include practical tips based on the target season's weather
Reference related content on the site where relevant

Include relevant collection links (restaurants, accommodations) where appropriate
